channel.title: [pi]command help

item.title: [pi]command help
item.dc:creator: @badboyzack10 badboyzack10
item.description:
@badboyzack10 wrote:

can some1 change my command so you need to take all items off

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("resetstrength")) { c.playerXP[2]=0; c.playerLevel[2] = 1; c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Take off your items first!"); return; } } }

Read full topic
